org.opends.server.extensions

Class RedirectingByteChannel

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.opends.server.extensions.RedirectingByteChannel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable, java.nio.channels.ByteChannel, java.nio.channels.Channel, java.nio.channels.ReadableByteChannel, java.nio.channels.WritableByteChannel

    public class RedirectingByteChannel
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.nio.channels.ByteChannel
    This class redirects read and write requests either to a child byte channel, or a byte channel to be redirected to.
